title: Tiger King 2 (pt 1)
description:
Tig and Cheryl return to the Tiger King saga, and this week they're talking about the first 2 episodes of Tiger King 2, available to watch on Netflix! Between Joe Exotic, Carole Baskin, and the rest of the cast of characters, there's so much to catch up on-- you won't want to miss this episode! *this episode spills beans* get merch at podswag.com/tigandcheryl (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
